languages.text: {n}Абеляр держится немного в стороне, будто избегает приближаться к Драйвстему. Подле сенешаля стоит девушка, и в их лицах заметно родственное сходство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр держится немного в стороне, будто избегает приближаться к Драйвстему. Подле сенешаля стоит девушка, и в их лицах заметно родственное сходство.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр держится немного в стороне, будто избегает приближаться к Драйвстему. Подле сенешаля стоит девушка, и в их лицах заметно родственное сходство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard is keeping some distance from the others, as if reluctant to approach Urbend. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance.{/n}
{n}Abelard is keeping some distance from the others, as if reluctant to approach Urbend. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance.{/n}
{n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

{n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラードはドライブステンに近づくのを渋っているかのように、他の人たちから少々離れて立っている。アベラードの隣に立つのは若い女性で、両者は家族なのか似ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードはドライブステンに近づくのを渋っているかのように、他の人たちから少々離れて立っている。アベラードの隣に立つのは若い女性で、両者は家族なのか似ている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德和其他人站得有些远，似乎不愿靠近德莱夫斯塔。站在他旁边的是一位年轻女子，你注意到两人有几分相似之处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德和其他人站得有些远，似乎不愿靠近德莱夫斯塔。站在他旁边的是一位年轻女子，你注意到两人有几分相似之处。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard guarda cierta distancia con los demás, como si no quisiera acercarse a Drivestem. Junto a él está una joven con la que guarda cierto parecido familiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard guarda cierta distancia con los demás, como si no quisiera acercarse a Drivestem. Junto a él está una joven con la que guarda cierto parecido familiar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme s'il avait quelque réticence à s'approcher de Drivestem, Abélard se tient en retrait, en compagnie d'une jeune femme avec qui il partage un indéniable air de famille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme s'il avait quelque réticence à s'approcher de Drivestem, Abélard se tient en retrait, en compagnie d'une jeune femme avec qui il partage un indéniable air de famille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard steht ein wenig abseits von den anderen, als wolle er sich Drivestem gar nicht nähern. Neben ihm ist eine junge Frau, und die Familienähnlichkeit ist unverkennbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stands somewhat apart from the others, as if reluctant to approach Drivestem. Next to him is a young woman, and you notice a family resemblance between them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard steht ein wenig abseits von den anderen, als wolle er sich Drivestem gar nicht nähern. Neben ihm ist eine junge Frau, und die Familienähnlichkeit ist unverkennbar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, sanki Drivestem'e yaklaşmaktan çekiniyormuşçasına diğerlerinden biraz uzakta duruyor. Yanındaysa genç bir kadın var. İkisinin arasında ailevi bir benzerlik fark ediyorsun.{/n}
